description: Retrieves the list of schemas from the Data Lake Analytics catalog.

select.description: OData Select statement. Limits the properties on each entry to just those requested, e.g. Categories?$select=CategoryName,Description. Optional.

orderby.description: OrderBy clause. One or more comma-separated expressions with an optional 'asc' (the default) or 'desc' depending on the order you'd like the values sorted, e.g. Categories?$orderby=CategoryName desc. Optional.

version.description: the version of the catalog item.

top.description: The number of items to return. Optional.

skip.description: The number of items to skip over before returning elements. Optional.

count.description: The Boolean value of true or false to request a count of the matching resources included with the resources in the response, e.g. Categories?$count=true. Optional.

computeaccountname.description: the name of the Data Lake Analytics account.
